front.title: ANSI American National Standard Schedule of Dielectric Test Values for Outdoor AC High-Voltage Circuit Breaker External Insulation Rated on a Symmetrical Current Basis

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard covers the schedule of dielectric test values for American National Standard, C37.078-1972 (IEEE Std 343-1972) which contains definitions, ratings, construction, and test procedure.
